General Conduct.title: Respect All Members
General Conduct.content: Treat everyone with respect. Bullying, harassment, hate speech, and discrimination will not be tolerated.

General Conduct.title: No Spamming
General Conduct.content: Avoid spamming in any form, including text, images, or links. Keep the chat clean and readable.

General Conduct.title: Language
General Conduct.content: Use appropriate language at all times. No excessive swearing or offensive remarks.

Voice Channels.title: Use Appropriate Channels
Voice Channels.content: Join the relevant voice channels for your activity. Avoid disrupting other channels.

Voice Channels.title: No Background Noise
Voice Channels.content: Ensure your microphone is free from excessive background noise. Use push-to-talk if necessary.

Voice Channels.title: Respect Others
Voice Channels.content: Do not yell, blast music, or intentionally disrupt others in voice channels.

Content Sharing.title: NSFW Content
Content Sharing.content: Sharing NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is strictly prohibited.

Content Sharing.title: Spam and Ads
Content Sharing.content: Do not post unsolicited advertisements or spam links. Keep content relevant to the discussion.

Content Sharing.title: Intellectual Property
Content Sharing.content: Respect copyright laws. Do not share pirated or illegal content.

Community Interaction.title: Help New Members
Community Interaction.content: Be welcoming to new members and provide assistance when needed.

Community Interaction.title: Report Issues
Community Interaction.content: Report any issues, rule violations, or inappropriate behavior to the moderators.

Community Interaction.title: Positive Participation
Community Interaction.content: Contribute positively to the community. Engage in discussions, events, and help maintain a friendly atmosphere.
